selections.name: Sweet Rebellion
selections.reason: Shows the best race form with a solid 3rd at Eagle Farm in a $28k maiden. Experience counts for a lot in these 2YO scampers.

selections.name: Sun Sister
selections.reason: Ran a credible 6th in a $60k Open at Doomben. Drops significantly in class here and maps well from the draw.

selections.name: Zandari
selections.reason: Kendrick stable is lethal with juveniles. Won a recent trial at Sunshine Coast Inner Track and looks ready to fire on debut.

selections.name: Toscanella
selections.reason: Another debutant who won a trial nicely at Toowoomba. Watch betting moves.

danger_horse.name: Zandari
danger_horse.reason: Unexposed first starter from a top provincial stable.

selections.name: State In Texas
selections.reason: Won at this track and distance on Jan 31 in Soft going. Carries a manageable 129lbs compared to the top weight.

selections.name: Campai
selections.reason: The class runner of the field but has to lug a massive 141lbs (64kg). Distance specialist but the weight is a concern.

selections.name: Zoe Shark
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran 2nd at Toowoomba last start. Has speed and draws well.

selections.name: Beauty Bound
selections.reason: Resuming for a new stable. Previous form in SA was decent. Watch market.

danger_horse.name: Campai
danger_horse.reason: Massive weight but massive class edge.

selections.name: Emperor
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Eagle Farm in CL6 grade. Rates highest on recent figures and maps perfectly.

selections.name: Brereton
selections.reason: Gollan runner who finished 4th in a BM90 last start. Drops in grade here and is a major threat.

selections.name: Krakarib
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at this track last start. Carries light weight (119lbs) and has speed.

selections.name: Goldsborough
selections.reason: Class 92 runner resuming. Huge weight but has elite back class.

selections.name: Icymiss
selections.reason: Hoysted stable. Ran a solid 4th at this track in December. Draws low and should be competitive in a depleted field.

selections.name: Lavarack
selections.reason: Gollan debutant. Trials have been fair but stable must be respected in this weak maiden.

selections.name: Shaque D'amour
selections.reason: Emergency who gains a run. 4th at Doomben last start reads well for this.

selections.name: Rockabilly
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed in city grade previously. Trialled well.

danger_horse.name: Shaque D'amour
danger_horse.reason: Doomben form lines are superior to most here.

selections.name: Maurita
selections.reason: Won at this track and distance on Jan 21. Proven stayer who handles the conditions.

selections.name: Whatjeudoin'
selections.reason: Consistent type with a 2nd at Sunshine Coast and 6th at Doomben. Kropp stable stays all day.

selections.name: Montevecchio
selections.reason: Ran 2nd at this track on Jan 31. Light weight gives him a chance if he gets in from the wide gate.

selections.name: Vermeer
selections.reason: Consistent placer. 2nd at Grafton last start. Will be running on.

danger_horse.name: Whatjeudoin'
danger_horse.reason: Honest stayer knocking on the door.

selections.name: Treporti
selections.reason: Class runner. 3rd at Eagle Farm in CL4 company last start is the best form reference. Should dominate this.

selections.name: Run Lucy Run
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Thornton rides. Steps up but is in form.

selections.name: North Court
selections.reason: Placed 3rd here in similar grade recently. Consistent.

selections.name: Smart Action
selections.reason: Fitter for recent racing. Can improve into the placings.

selections.name: Maybe
selections.reason: Tony Gollan trainee coming off a 3rd at Doomben in CL1. That city form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Roaring Success
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at this track and grade on Feb 12. Quick backup indicates fitness.

selections.name: Gozo
selections.reason: Resuming for Heathcote/Duric. Won maiden well last prep. Watch betting.

selections.name: Chiba
selections.reason: Heinrich runner. 7th at Doomben but drops to provincial level. Inside gate helps.

danger_horse.name: Roaring Success
danger_horse.reason: Proven track performer with recent form.

selections.name: Bright The Sun
selections.reason: Finished 4th at Ipswich in a BM65. Drops significantly in grade to a 0-58 here. Major player.

selections.name: Clearly George
selections.reason: Last start winner at Gatton. Confidence is high and draws well.

selections.name: Takunai
selections.reason: Ran 2nd at Gold Coast Poly. Handles weight and distance.

selections.name: Treasurer
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed at Beaudesert. Each-way hope.

danger_horse.name: Clearly George
danger_horse.reason: Last start winner in this grade.
